name: css-filter-hue-rotate
description: Css module of single purpose classes for filter hue rotate

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-filter-hue-rotate.css > css/css-filter-hue-rotate.css && tachyons src/css-filter-hue-rotate.css --minify > css/css-filter-hue-rotate.min.css && tachyons src/css-filter-hue-rotate.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
